reviews.subject: Introduction to Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson is an amazing professor! Her lectures are engaging and she really cares about her students.

reviews.subject: Calculus I
reviews.review: Dr. Thompson's lectures are clear, but his exams are extremely difficult. Be prepared to study hard.

reviews.subject: Modern Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Clark has a deep knowledge of the subject, but sometimes her lectures can be a bit dry.

reviews.subject: Physics II
reviews.review: Dr. Lee knows his stuff, but he isn't very good at explaining concepts. Office hours are a must.

reviews.subject: Organic Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Garcia's course is very challenging, and she doesn't offer much help outside of class.

reviews.subject: World History
reviews.review: Dr. Miller is very passionate about history. His classes are interesting, but his grading is tough.

reviews.subject: Economics 101
reviews.review: Dr. Davis makes economics easy to understand. Her exams are fair and her lectures are lively.

reviews.subject: Computer Science 101
reviews.review: Dr. Wilson's lectures are decent, but the projects are very challenging and time-consuming.

reviews.subject: Spanish Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez is fantastic! She is very supportive and her classes are both informative and fun.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Brown's lectures are unorganized and he often goes off-topic. Not the best experience.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. Harris is very knowledgeable and her passion for art is contagious. However, her exams are difficult.

reviews.subject: Biology 101
reviews.review: Dr. Young's lectures are informative, but his grading is very strict. Be prepared to work hard.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Dr. King is an excellent professor. She is very engaging and encourages critical thinking.

reviews.subject: Philosophy 101
reviews.review: Dr. Lewis's classes are thought-provoking, but sometimes the material can be difficult to grasp.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Dr. Walker's lectures are straightforward, but her exams are tricky. Make sure to attend her office hours.

reviews.subject: Chemistry 101
reviews.review: Dr. Allen's lectures are hard to follow and his exams are brutal. Not an easy class.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Evans is a wonderful professor! Her classes are engaging and she really cares about her students.

reviews.subject: Macroeconomics
reviews.review: Dr. Wright is very knowledgeable and his lectures are interesting, but his exams are challenging.

reviews.subject: Human Anatomy
reviews.review: Dr. Green's lectures are detailed, but the pace is fast. The lab work is also quite intense.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Anthropology
reviews.review: Dr. Baker is very passionate about anthropology and it shows in his lectures. However, his grading can be tough.
